Game Jam 2025.description: The Game Jam is a week long beginner-friendly competition between developers on creating a game. It is open to all CSI and Brooklyn College students and majors.

Judging Criteria.description: The game prompts players to interact with it and provides rules and features that allow them to understand the game goals.
The game should include novel or unique aspects, either through a truly new concept or a novel application of an existing concept or concepts.
The game should clearly demonstrate through concept, gameplay, story, or characters, the prompt/concept.
While not all future development must be shown during the jam, plans for future expansion of the game or multiple varied gameplay features should be presented.
The team presents their proposed game clearly to the audience through a 5-minute video presentation.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: What is Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: The Game Jam is a week long beginner-friendly competition between developers on creating a game.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: Who can participate in Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: The Game Jam 2025 is open to all CSI and Brooklyn College students and majors.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: When is Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: Game Jam 2025 is from January 16th @ 2:00pm to January 24th @ 5:00pm.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: What is the discord server for Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: You can join the discord here: https://discord.com/invite/q4Yyx3dhJC

Frequently Asked Questions.question: Will be there food at Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: Yes, there will be food at Game Jam 2025.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: Do I need to have experience to participate in Game Jam 2025?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: No, you do not need to have experience to participate in Game Jam 2025. The competition is beginner-friendly.

Frequently Asked Questions.question: What is the team limit for Game Jam 2025? Can I participate alone?
Frequently Asked Questions.answer: The team limit for Game Jam 2025 is 4. You can participate alone or with a team.
